sen.j: 大学寮出身の叩き上げで、但馬国・中宮職（藤原定子）大進・備中国・播磨国などを歴任した。
sen.e: He worked his way up as an official from Daigakuryo (training institute of Personal Authority in Heian Period to foster officials) and served in Tajima Province, at Imperial Palace as household official to Chugu (FUJIWARA no Teishi/Sadako), as Daishin (judicial official at the administrative office in Kyoto), and in Bicchu Province and in Harima Province.

sen.j: 長徳2年（996年）藤原伊周が失脚して大宰権帥に左遷された（長徳の変）際、密かに播磨国から入京したが、生昌はこれを藤原道長に密告した。
sen.e: In 996 when, FUJIWARA no Korechika was transferred to Dazai Gon no Sochi (deputy administrator of Dazaifu) after his downfall (Chotoku Incident), he secretly returned from Harima Province to enter Kyoto, however Narimasa informed FUJIWARA no Michinaga against Korechika.
